name: Colorless Demo
description:
Welcome to Colorless! A game where an evil A̵̡̩͖̩̮̒̏̄̂͆́̉̓̀͛͑͒̈́͐̀͋́̾̔̌̚͝Ȃ̵̡̧̢̱͓̪̼͎̻̣̪͇̠̮̰̟̘̖̙͖̻̔̉̀̈́̅͆̕͝͝ͅẠ̷̳̜̈́̇̆͆̈́̀̀̂̈́͗̎̽̓͝A̶̧̡̙͓̜̣̖͈̰͎͖̠͚̖̩̒͜ has stolen all colors in the universe resulting in a lot of bad stuff happening.

Blocks turning evil, Everyone being sad, Its up to you to save the world and paint it back to its original colors!

Oh god! He's coming! H̵̺͠e̷̗͘l̷̤̑l̷͙͊o̶͓͒ ̸̟͛t̵̳̕h̵͖͌e̶̞͂r̶͚͘ḛ̴̃ ̵̫̅p̴̝͑e̶̥̾o̸̝̓p̴̖͛l̴͕̀e̸̛͖,̸͈͒ ̵̣͠Ī̶̼'̶̯̓m̷̩͋ ̷̭͑g̴̬̀ḻ̸̍ȧ̶̧ď̴͜ ̸͔̋y̶̩̒ö̵̧́ŭ̶͍ ̸͚͆č̸̰a̵̛ͅm̴̘̆ě̶̖ ̴͉̉h̶͚̅e̴͎̒r̴̼̕ė̴̯.̵̡̒ ̴̼̍I̵̟̿ ̶̛̼ḿ̶̬a̴͕͌d̸̼̂e̵̞̾ ̷̘̐s̵̯͋ủ̷̳r̸̡̽e̶̙̍ ̸̦̏ă̴̧l̷̯̎l̶͈͂ ̷͕̈́ẗ̷̢́h̷̳͝e̵̢̔ ̵̲͘p̴̞͐a̵̹͒i̵̪̊ń̸̲t̷̥̊ ̵̻͂b̷̮̊u̴͙̅ć̶̬ķ̵͑ẻ̴̼t̷̼̓s̵̱̄ ̴̼̕a̶̛͔ŕ̷̨e̷̗͠ ̷͇̑g̷̹͑ö̵̩́n̶̲͛e̴͚̍ ̷̞̌ã̶̗n̸͇͑d̸̻͝ ̴͇͑ŷ̵̬o̷̞͂u̸̹͆ ̶̬̋w̴̬̍ŏ̶͖n̷̠̄'̵̧͗ṫ̸̞ ̴̭̍c̴̹̎o̵͙͊l̸̪̋l̶̪̕e̷̩̿c̴͎̑t̸̮͛ ̸̫̓t̵̥́ĥ̷͚e̴̖̽m̷͓̌.̷̬͊ Ack, Sorry about that. But, Have fun with the game!

Why 'Jam Edition'?

Its called 'Jam Edition' because a lot more is planned for Colorless. A lot more.

Can I mod this game?

Yes, Indeed you can. I don't mind if you use scripts either. As long as you give credit then I'm fine with it. So that means decompiling is also allowed.

What's with all the unused graphics?

There's been a lot of thinking ahead of time, And that's what all the unused graphics are about. You'll see what they are about in probably a few years.

Are sequels planned?

No sequels like 'Colorless 2' or 'Colorless is Back' are ever planned. I don't think I want to make this series go on forever.

Why is it lacking sound?

Mac OS Catalina basically disabled the feature for me to add sound. Me dragging in audio into the Unity Project crashes it and I have to manually remove it. This will probably lower my score in the jam...

Why is it so short?

I'm a pretty new Unity developer, And I was rushed (No offense) so I guess it makes sense...

How to download?

Click on the 'download' button that appears when you scroll down. Unzip the '.zip' file and you can play. (Sorry if this wasn't clear enough!)
